articles.title: Tamil actor-director Manobala passes away at 69, Rajinikanth pays tribute - The Economic Times
articles.description: Manobala, a famous Tamil film director and actor, passed away at the age of 69. He began as a director with his first project being 'Agaya Gangai' in 1982, and then acted in many movies with top actors like Rajinikanth, Vijay and Dhanush.
